name: veiculo_tipo_id_marca_id_modelo_id_modelo_ano
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool veiculos_api.
Tool description: Tabela FIPE - Busca por marca, modelo e vers√£o. Atualizado: 08/08/2023
API description: Fetches vehicle information based on the provided type, brand, model, and year using the RapidAPI service.

id_modelo_ano.description: The year of the vehicle model.

veiculo_tipo.description: The type of the vehicle (e.g., car, motorcycle, etc.).

id_marca.description: The brand ID of the vehicle.

id_modelo.description: The model ID of the vehicle.
